name: Fire Report (VIC/AUS)

screenshots.caption: Mapplet client (BETA) just before submision to Google.
Initial progress, currently without incident markers on map.

short_description: The program expands on the data the CFA provides on their incident summary RSS feed and web page by providing a visual representation of each incident the CFA attended over the past five hours; plotted on a map of Victoria, Australia.
